alert.note: Alert for Marion; McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:59AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McPherson and Marion Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 459 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wells to Lindsborg to near Lyons. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Hillsboro, Marion, Moundridge, Inman, Peabody, Galva, Canton, Florence, Marquette, Goessel, Lincolnville, Ramona, Lehigh, Windom, Durham, Tampa, Lost Springs and Mcpherson Airport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 44 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
